title: How do i change client language without changing region?
body:
I tried to change my game from english to another language, and to do so i had to change my client region to another country, but when i tried to login it said that i was using the incorrect name/password combination. And when i tried to login to the lol website with the other region  it said wrong Name/pw/region combination

All i wanna do is change language, thanks in advance!

replies.body: Each region has a specific set of supported languages.  If you are selecting a language that's only supported for another region, then you would be logging into that region.  We have a[ supported languages ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language)guide to help clarify what's supported and where.  I hope that helps!
The question wasn't "where" and "how", the question was "why"
According to the title, "How" was the question.
